nodes.text: Aidan Vurt was a male individual who served as the political advisor of the Twi'lek Leontyne Saresh, a Senator in the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic during the Republic's Great Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. A politically cunning man, Vurt crafted a remarkably popular campaign for Saresh that emphasized her history as a self-liberated slave, and the two were later married. However, Vurt was killed in 3642 BBY during the Sith's invasion of the planet Taris, where his wife was leading the Republic initiative to rebuild the ruined world.
Aidan Vurt was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia's entry for Leontyne Saresh, though his species was not identified.
